function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Limited research on IPC measures in non-healthcare settings like manufacturing, industrial, essential retail, and public service settings.","Impact":"Potential lack of effective infection control in non-healthcare settings, increasing the risk of disease spread.","Mitigation":"Conduct research on IPC measures in non-healthcare settings, implement effective infection control protocols, and provide relevant training and education.","Technologies":"Advanced air filtration systems, contactless technologies, and monitoring and tracking systems for identifying potential cases.","People":"Workers and customers in manufacturing, industrial, essential retail, and public service settings.","Owner":"Research institutions, employers, and regulatory authorities."},{"Description":"Geographical concentration of COVID-19 occupational safety research in specific regions such as Europe, Central Asia, and North America.","Impact":"Limited understanding of occupational safety measures in regions with high COVID-19 case numbers, such as South America, Southern Asia, Oceania, and Africa.","Mitigation":"Encourage and fund research on COVID-19 occupational safety measures in regions with high case numbers, and collaborate with local stakeholders and authorities.","Technologies":"Remote monitoring and communication technologies, data analytics for identifying trends, and mobile health applications for providing guidance and support.","People":"Essential workers in regions with high case numbers, local researchers, and public health authorities.","Owner":"International organizations, research institutions, and public health agencies."},{"Description":"Language barriers as a primary challenge in implementing COVID-19 IPC strategies in meatpacking plants with internationally diverse worker cohorts.","Impact":"Reduced effectiveness of IPC strategies due to challenges in communication, increasing the risk of disease spread among diverse worker cohorts.","Mitigation":"Implement multilingual communication strategies, provide language-specific training and education, and assess the effectiveness of multilingual signage and communication apps.","Technologies":"Translation and interpretation tools, multilingual communication apps, and interactive training platforms with language support.","People":"Internationally diverse worker cohorts in meatpacking plants.","Owner":"Employers, industry associations, and regulatory agencies."}]}
